body_html:
Make sure to update all pacakges using: pip3 install wheel

You can follow the installation guide: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/, use bazel 0.5.1 and gcc 4.8 to build TensorFlow on raspberry pi model 3B.
body_text:
Make sure to update all pacakges using: pip3 install wheel
You can follow the installation guide: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/, use bazel 0.5.1 and gcc 4.8 to build TensorFlow on raspberry pi model 3B.
body:
Make sure to update all pacakges using: pip3 install wheel

You can follow the installation guide: [https://www.tensorflow.org/install/](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/), use bazel 0.5.1 and gcc 4.8 to build TensorFlow on raspberry pi model 3B.
